ProximCloud: Deep Discounts on London Shared Hosting (20% Off Coupon Code!)

cheap hosting, cheap shared hosting, ddos proection, london, proximcloud July 1, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

ProximCloud first started posting offers with us back in April 2020.  A year later, they’re still bringing our readers great hosting offers in London.  We last had an offer for them on May 14, 2021 and now they’re back with coupon codes!

  • Get 20% off a quarterly, semi-annual, annual, biennial or triennial service!
  • Or get 10% off monthly service!

And the prices are pretty respectable to start with a great host, so if London is where you want to be, read on for the deals.

Their WHOIS is public. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept PayPal.

Here’s a little about ProximCloud in their own words:

ProximCloud is a small website hosting business, which has been in operation for over three years (since 28th Feb 2018), which has striven based on the reliability and low-cost factors of our services. ProximCloud always puts the customer first, and has ensured to provide our customers with many support-methods to ensure they can reach us when they need it, and when it suits them.

If you decide to give ProximCloud a try, please tell others how it goes in the comments below.

Now read more to see the offers!

Coupon Codes

  • LEBNZ31 will provide all LEB browsers with 10% off a monthly service with ProximCloud covering our Deluxe, Ultra or Unlimited package.
